sentences: Carola Dibbell (born April 4, 1945) is an American music journalist and author.
Dibbell was born in New York City and grew up in Greenwich Village.
Her first book, the sci-fi novel The Only Ones, was published by Two Dollar Radio in 2015.
The Washington Post's Nancy Hightower named it one of the best science fiction books of 2015.
Dibbell married music critic Robert Christgau, who  introduced her to music criticism in 1974.
They adopted a daughter, Nina Dibbell Christgau, and as of 2020 have long lived in New York.
